titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that witnesses at Federal grand jury proceedings have the right to the assistance of counsel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to grant a witness before a grand jury the right to have an attorney present to assist that witness during questioning.
